name: NEFilterRemediationVerdict
desc: The result from a filter data provider after the user requests remediation for a blocked flow.

items.name: class func allow() -> NEFilterRemediationVerdict
items.desc: Create a verdict that indicates to the system that the Filter Data Provider will allow the flow to pass to its final destination when/if the flow is requested again.

items.name: class func drop() -> NEFilterRemediationVerdict
items.desc: Create a verdict that indicates to the system that the Filter Data Provider will continue to block the flow of network data if/when the flow is requested again.

items.name: class func needRules() -> NEFilterRemediationVerdict
items.desc: Create a verdict that indicates to the system that the Filter Data Provider needs the filtering rules to be updated before it can make a remediation decision about the current flow of network data.
